attributes.action: Pull all UK troops out of Syria due to lack of evidence and faith in Theresa May
attributes.additional_details: No evidence of chemical weapons used in Salisbury.
attributes.background: Pointing fingers with no evidence is an idiotic way to approach. Still no evidence of chemical weapons used in Salisbury. Syria clearly need help, not war. They aren't attacking us, we are attacking them. Stop the war in Syria. War is money for the rich
